rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C120525

self.title: CDISC SDTM Immunogenicity Specimen Assessments Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the immunogenicity specimen test codes of the CDISC Study Data Tabulation Model.
name: Immunogenicity Specimen Assessments Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Immunogenicity Specimen Assessments Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: A measurement of the binding antidrug antibody in a biological specimen. A binding antidrug antibody is an antibody that binds to a test article, and/or portion(s) of the test article.

A measurement of the neutralizing binding antidrug antibody in a biological specimen. A neutralizing binding antidrug antibody is a type of ADA that binds to the functional portion of a test article leading to diminished or negated pharmacological activity.

A measurement of the neutralizing cross-reactive binding antidrug antibody in a biological specimen. A neutralizing cross-reactive binding antidrug antibody is a type of ADA that binds to an endogenous molecule that is structurally similar to an analogue test article and diminishes or negates its function.
terms.preferredTerm: Neutralizing Cross-Reacting Binding Antidrug Antibody Measurement

terms.definition: A measurement of the cross-reactive binding antidrug antibody in a biological specimen. A cross-reactive binding antidrug antibody is a type of ADA that binds to the endogenous molecule that is structurally similar to an analogue test article.
A measurement of the Ebola virus specific IgG antibody secreting cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Ebola Virus Specific IgG Antibody Secreting Cell Count
synonyms: EBOV Specific IgG AB Secreting Cells

terms.definition: A measurement of the Ebola virus specific IgM antibody secreting cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Ebola Virus Specific IgM Antibody Secreting Cell Count
synonyms: EBOV Specific IgM AB Secreting Cells

terms.definition: A measurement of the H1 specific IgG antibody secreting cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Influenza Hemagglutinin 1 Specific IgG Antibody Secreting Cell Count
synonyms: H1 Specific IgG Antibody Secreting Cells

terms.definition: A measurement of the H3 specific IgG antibody secreting cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Influenza Hemagglutinin 3 Specific IgG Antibody Secreting Cell Count
synonyms: H3 Specific IgG Antibody Secreting Cells

terms.definition: A measurement of the HIV-1 seroreactivity in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the HIV-2 seroreactivity in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the total IgM antibody secreting cells in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the total IgG antibody secreting cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Total IgG Antibody Secreting Cell Count

terms.definition: A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of T-lymphocyte proliferation due to stimulation by an antigen of interest to a non-stimulated T-lymphocyte proliferation control.
